data.blankContent: Transportation is the process of transporting a person, animal, or thing from one location to another. In ____ times, ____ term ____ refers ____ the ____ of ____ or ____ from ____ location ____ another. Transportation ____ be ____ by ____, such ____ by ____ or ____, by ____ such ____ by ____, or ____ air ____ as ____ plane. The term transportation is also attributed to the process of transporting goods in bulk.

data.answer: 运输是指将人、动物或事物从一个地方运输到另一个地方的过程。在现代，这个词通常指人员或货物从一个地点到另一个地点的流动。运输可以通过陆路，如火车或汽车，通过海运，如船，或通过航空，如飞机。“运输”一词也指散装运输货物的过程。
